solution_line_template: He uses {sets_used_per_show} sets a night and tosses {sets_tossed_per_show} sets to fans so he needs {sets_used_per_show}+{sets_tossed_per_show} = <<{sets_used_per_show}+{sets_tossed_per_show}={total_sets_per_night}>>{total_sets_per_night} sets a night

He goes through {total_sets_per_night} sets a night for {num_nights} nights so he needs {total_sets_per_night}*{num_nights} = <<{total_sets_per_night}*{num_nights}={total_sets_needed}>>{total_sets_needed} drum stick sets
